member.name: T:HospiceMalta.Controllers.AssessmentsApiController
member.summary: Handles Assessment information.

member.name: M:HospiceMalta.Controllers.AssessmentsApiController.GetAssessments
member.summary: Returns all the Asssessments in the database.

member.name: M:HospiceMalta.Controllers.AssessmentsApiController.GetAssessmentTypes
member.summary: Returns all the Assessment Types in the database so as to populate the Dropdown of the same name.

member.name: M:HospiceMalta.Controllers.AssessmentsApiController.GetAssessmentOrigins
member.summary: Returns all the Assessment Origins in the database so as to popualte the Dropdown of the same name.

member.name: M:HospiceMalta.Controllers.AssessmentsApiController.GetAssessmentWorkers
member.summary: Returns all the Employees in the database so as to populate the Dropdown of the same name.

member.name: M:HospiceMalta.Controllers.AssessmentsApiController.GetAssessment(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns an assessment with the corresponding Assessment ID, to fill the input fields on the page.
member.param: The Assessment's ID to to search for.

member.name: M:HospiceMalta.Controllers.AssessmentsApiController.GetAssessmentsOfPatient(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns all the Assessments of a particular Patient.
member.param: The Patient's file-number to use to filter the results returned.

member.name: M:HospiceMalta.Controllers.CarePlanApiController.GetCarePlans
member.summary: Returns all the Care Plans in the database.

member.name: M:HospiceMalta.Controllers.CarePlanApiController.GetCarePlanTypes
member.summary: Returns all the Care Plan types to populate the Drop down list of the same name.

member.name: M:HospiceMalta.Controllers.CarePlanApiController.GetCarePlanStatuses
member.summary: Returns all the Care Plan statuses to populate the Drop down list of the same name.

member.name: M:HospiceMalta.Controllers.CarePlanApiController.GetCarePlan(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns a Care Plan with the matching Care Plan ID from the database to fill the input fields on the page with.
member.param: The Care Plan ID to search for.

member.name: M:HospiceMalta.Controllers.CarePlanApiController.GetCarePlansOfPatient(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns all the Care Plans of a particular patient.
member.param: The Patient's file number to filter by.

member.name: M:HospiceMalta.Controllers.PatientAssessmentsApiController.GetPatientAssessments
member.summary: Returns all Patient Assessments in the database.

member.name: M:HospiceMalta.Controllers.PatientAssessmentsApiController.GetPatientAssessmentTypes
member.summary: Returns all Patient Assessment types in the database to populate the Drop Down list of the same name.

member.name: M:HospiceMalta.Controllers.PatientAssessmentsApiController.GetPatientAssessmentGrades
member.summary: Returns all Patient Assessment grades in the database to popluate the Drop Down list of the same name.

member.name: M:HospiceMalta.Controllers.PatientAssessmentsApiController.GetPatientAssessmentTypeGrades(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns all Patient Assessment grades associated with the Type ID passed, to populate the Drop Down list after a Type is chosen.
member.param: The Type ID to filter the results by.

member.name: M:HospiceMalta.Controllers.PatientAssessmentsApiController.GetPatientAssessment(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns a particular Patient Assessment from the database to fill every input field on the page.
member.param: The Patient Assessment's ID to searh for.

member.name: M:HospiceMalta.Controllers.PatientAssessmentsApiController.GetPatientAssessmentsOfPatient(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the Patient Assessments of a particular Patient in the database.
member.param: The Patient ID to filter the results by.

member.name: T:HospiceMalta.Controllers.UsersApiController
member.summary: Handles User information

member.name: M:HospiceMalta.Controllers.UsersApiController.GetUserByUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Search for users that contain the passed string in their Username.

member.name: M:HospiceMalta.Controllers.UsersApiController.GetUserById(System.Guid)
member.summary: Search for a user with the matching User ID in their User ID.
member.param: The User ID to search for.

member.name: M:HospiceMalta.Controllers.UsersApiController.GetAuthenticateUser(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Authenticates that the login credentials match and exist in the database.

member.name: M:HospiceMalta.Controllers.UsersApiController.GetWorkerEmails
member.summary: Returns a list of Employee email addresses to use for the Staff list in the Email modal.
